name: V1_Ch6_ThetaLogic_NormalFormTheorem
intent: Assert that any semantic logic formula can be rewritten to a Θ-aware logical normal form.

domain.formula_space: All well-formed formulas built from Primitive Logical Entities and logic operators.

constraints.termination: Logic rewrite to NF must terminate in finite steps.
constraints.equivalence: Normal form must be Π-equivalent to original formula.
